title: Autofill is cancer.
body:
Autofill should be an option for shorter queue times, 
You can litearlly lose a game pre determined because someone first times a role or a champion and it doesnt matter how well you play, they cost you the game because of autofill, This is complete bs, and should be removed or adjusted in this game.
I would rather wait an HOUR to get into a game with no autofill, then wait 3 minutes just to get 2 autofilled players, who cost me the game due to their incompetence at the role they play.

AUTOFILL SHOULD BE AN OPTION, I DONT CARE ABOUT QUEUE TIMES, Make it an option for people who are sick of losing due to this  system.

replies.body: The other thing being that Autofill should be fixed in general, i know in Normal Draft several times me and my friends get auto filled, to the point where we have to switch roles between ourselves because 2/3 of us get autofilled when in reality only one of us needed to be at most.
